attributes.action: Legalise BB guns to be owned without a licence, as long as they are made of a clear/opaque plastic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bb guns cant kill, and if theyre made of a clear/opaque plastic cant be used to hold up or mug any victims because it would be obvious its a fake. It makes no sense that a potentially fatal air rifle/gun, can be bought over the counter without the need for a licence, yet a bb gun capable of nothing more than a red mark on the skin has been made illegal without a licence.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
